David Hatton; Sculptor, Model Maker and Muralist

Home

Welcome to David Hatton's Web presence. Go to my Portfolio to see examples of my work.

I have been living in Colchester for the last 26 years. After leaving Art School, I joined the Art Department of a Colchester based Leisure Design company where I worked for five years before turning to freelance work. Being self employed for the last twenty years has allowed me to work in a wide range of disciplines. This has varied from large scale art work to small scale technical model-making and prototyping, and from mural painting to wood and stone carving.

David Hatton

A Sculptor/ModelMaker and Scenic Artist for over 25 years.
